short_summary: To acquire equipment for electric vehicle charging systems
description: See Notice of Proposed Procurement and Request for Bid
full_summary:
================:=[Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment](#electric-vehicle-supply-equipment)

* [Text version](#text-version)
* [Brief description](#brief-description)

### Text version

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED) is seeking a proposal for the Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment project through a Request for Proposal (RFP) method.

### Brief description

ISED invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the procurement of electric vehicle supply equipment, including charging systems.

### Entry metadata

* **Reference number:** cb-7288-27129172
* **Amendment number:** 1
* **Publication date:** 2023-07-17
* **Tender closing date:** 2023-07-31T 14:00
* **Procurement method:** Competitive – Traditional
* **Notice type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of opportunity/system requirements:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

### Regions of opportunity/system requirements

This procurement is limited to suppliers capable of delivering electric vehicle supply equipment in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Related documents:**

* [Annex A – Group 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7288/annex_a-group-3-v1.xlsx)
* [Notice of Proposed Procurement and Request for Bid](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7288/nor-english.pdf)
* [E60HN 21 EVSE Request for Proposal RFP En Group 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7288/e60hn_21evse-annex_f-rfp_en-group-3.pdf)

Contact:

* Nathalie Craig
* Nathalie.Craig@ised-isde.gc.ca
* (343) 291-2720

Please note, note the deadline stated in the original text, which has expired. You may want to verify that this message was sent correctly! 
### 

If that were the case you will have to work under time pressure, btw! 

That isn't just the endeavor of a formatting polishing. Significant work is put into extracting and refining necessary information. I preferred some minor description details themselves out, due to character limitations
